file_content.text: The Gravestone has joined the battle, but our fleet numbers make victory inevitable.
Burn Odessen, and bring me the ashes. I want them for my garden.
Father's pet. I was just talking about you.
My daughter has taken your bait.
Fried those artillery guns, as promised. Guess they weren't happy about it.
They kind of got me pinned down. Gonna need a little help.
Vette's not the only one in trouble.
Enemy ambush cut us off. I'm the only one left. Position's about to be overrun.
Yeah, well, I've got about two minutes before they squash me like a bug!
Even you cannot save everyone, Outlander. By choosing who shall live, you also choose who shall die. Are you ready for that burden?
He was here, wasn't he... Valkorion.
I felt his presence, too.
Forget about him. Torian and Vette need us.
My focus is on my friends.
Maybe we should split up.
That would slow us down. You'd lose them both. If we stick together, we might reach one in time.
Torian, we're coming your way.
[Save Torian]
Wait. You're just... abandoning me?
I'm not abandoning you, Vette. You're next. Hold tight.
We'll come for you after.
Hold tight. Sure. Maybe that's what I'll tell everyone shooting at me.
Vette's a survivor. She may surprise us.
Come! Torian needs our help.
I felt something. A presence. It was Valkorion, wasn't it?
That would slow us down. They could both die. If we stick together, we might reach one of them in time.
Vette, we're coming for you.
[Save Vette]
He's still playing his games. Telling me I have to choose between Torian and Vette.
Stirring up trouble, as usual.
Splitting up's the only way we can save both Vette and Torian.
We need to split up.
For once, he may be speaking the truth. I don't think we can reach them both in time, even if we split up.
This is war, Vette. A Mandalorian soldier is just a more valuable resource.
Torian's more valuable.
That's all I am to you? A resource? Well, at least I know where I stand.
I know how resourceful you are, Vette. You'll find a way out of this.
You'll figure something out.
Save it, Commander. I need a rescue, not a pep talk.
Is this a joke? You're abandoning me? I thought... I thought you loved me.
You don't need me to save you, Vette. You know how to look after yourself.
You're a survivor.
Forgive me, Vette. I wish it didn't have to be this way.
I'm sorry I had to do this.
You know me. You had to know our relationship would end badly.
This can't be a shock.
Is that pep talk supposed to make me feel better? Because it really doesn't.
It doesn't! You could save me and leave Torian to... no. Forget it. Nothing you say will make this right.
Not this badly! Serves me right for ever trusting a Sith.
Vette's a survivor. She might surprise us.
I'm not afraid to die. Just didn't think I'd go out like this.
You're not dead yet, Torian. Keep fighting. After we help Vette, we'll come for you.
Don't give up.
I'm not afraid to die. I just wish I could see you one last time.
I know how this ends. Just win the war. Don't let me die in vain.
Torian could survive this. Mandos are notoriously hard to kill.
He may get out of this. Mandalorians are tough to kill.
I've never known a Mandalorian to shy away from battle. You can fight your way to freedom.
You can handle this.
I can always find more troops to fight for me. Vette's one of a kind.
Soldiers are expendable.
I can't argue with that. Just make sure you win this war. That'll count for something.
I've seen enough battles to know the odds. Just win this war so my life means something.
I know how strong you are. We will meet again.
You can survive this.
No, we won't. I know how this ends.
Forgive me. I love you.
I'm sorry I had to do this.
I understand. A leader has to make hard choices.
Admitting defeat is a sign of weakness.
I didn't expect you to quit.
I will go down fighting--but I know how this ends.
Our forces have suffered enough, Vaylin. This won't end until we face each other.
Enough blood has been spilled.
I've been up and down the battlefield looking for you. I can't believe you're cowering on a ship.
You're still hiding from me?
How many of your underlings do I have to butcher? Get down here and give me a challenge!
Come out and fight, coward.
I hide from no one.
Oh, I intend to.
You think I care how many die in this war?
Vaylin will be here soon. I want status updates.
Come on, Vette needs us.
Hurry! Vette needs our help.
Hurry! Torian needs our help.
Now that I've broken Father's chains, I could crush you in a second--but that's too easy.
I will chew up your friends, and grind your precious Alliance into paste. When I finally hunt you down, you'll beg me to end your suffering.
The longer you draw this out, the more time my agents have to infiltrate Zakuul and steal away your throne.
[Lie] I'm taking your empire.
Your whole family's on Odessen. Valkorion, Arcann, even Senya. Stop playing games, and come have your revenge!
Come kill your family.
You're lying.
Aaargh!
You lost face when I crashed your party on Zakuul. If you want to reclaim it, meet me in battle--and stop acting like a child.
Fight like an empress.
Valkorion's all that remains of your family. If you want revenge, come and claim it!
Come kill your father.
You'll regret this.
With pleasure.
Better clear out some of these enemy troops before Vaylin shows up.
We should clear out as many enemy troops as possible before my sister arrives.
He might be telling the truth for once. Even if we split up, we can't reach them both in time.
What if we split up?
I knew I could count on you.
Thank you. I'll hold my ground until you arrive.
Let's move! Vette needs our help.
Let's move! Torian needs our help.
